title: ABIRISK
description: Anti-Biopharmaceutical Immunization: Prediction and Analysis of Clinical Relevance to Minimize the Risk

types.value: Infinium HTS Automated Protocol (Illumina, San Diego, CA, USA)

projectAssets.name: Anti-Biopharmaceutical Immunization: Prediction and analysis of clinical relevance to minimize the risk of immunization in multiple sclerosis patients on interferon-beta treatment
projectAssets.description: Patients with MS or Clinically Isolated Syndrome (CIS) diagnosis according to McDonald criteria and who were prescribed IFN-beta-1a intramuscularly (IM), IFN-beta-1a subcutaneously (SC), or IFN-beta-1b SC (original product or biosimilar) were recruited from January 30, 2014 to January 22, 2016. Patients who were not naive to IFN-beta were excluded.

studyGroups.name: 147 patients (103 female, 44 male) diagnosed with MS.

output.title: ABIRISK MS clinical and ADA data

projectAssets.name: Anti-Biopharmaceutical Immunization: Prediction and Analysis of Clinical Relevance to Minimize the Risk of Immunization in Rheumatoid Arthritis Patients or Juvenile Idiopathic Arthritis Patients (ABI-RA)
projectAssets.description: Patients with RA diagnosis according to 2010 ACR/EULAR criteria and who were prescribed for the first time a BP among the TNF inhibitors adalimumab, infliximab (original product or biosimilar), etanercept, the anti-CD20 antibody rituximab, or the anti-IL6R antibody tocilizumab (administered SC or intravenously) as first-line or second-line therapy were recruited from March 3, 2014 to June 21, 2016. Patients who were not naive for the biotherapy they were given in the study were excluded.

studyGroups.name: 229 patients (176 female, 53 male) diagnosed with RA.

output.title: ABIRISK RA clinical and ADA data

projectAssets.name: Anti-Biopharmaceutical Immunization : Prediction and analysis of clinical relevance to minimize the risk in Inflammatory bowel disease (IBD)
projectAssets.description: Patients with Crohn’s disease or ulcerative colitis diagnosis according to ECCO guidelines and who were prescribed adalimumab or infliximab (original product or biosimilar) were recruited from September 11, 2013 to February 15, 2016. Patients who were not naive to TNF inhibitor therapy or who were treated with corticoids more than 30 mg/day over the last 15 days were excluded.

studyGroups.name: 184 patients (89 female, 95 male) diagnosed with IBD.

output.title: ABIRISK IBD clinical and ADA data
